casebody.data:
STATE
v.
PATTERSON No. COA07-622 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed February 19, 2008. Certification Date March 10, 2008. Appeal from Anson (05CRS51676, 05CRS51677, 05CRS51679).

Decision without published opinion. Affirmed as to trial court's denial of defendant's motion to suppress; Remanded for a new sentencing hearing on the charges of first-degree rape and first-degree kidnapping.
